sectionsSubtitle: Offering fun and challenging activities, unique experiences, everyday adventure and the chance to help others so that we make a positive impact in communities.
contactSubjectPlaceholder: Let us know how we can help you
heroSentenceOne: Established in 1909, 1st Chertsey Scout Group continues to thrive, providing fun, adventure, and development opportunities.
heroSentenceTwo: At present, over 100 young people take part in activities each week, with a diverse programme provided by an experienced team of volunteer leaders and parent helpers.
siteTitle: 1st Chertsey Scout Group | Adventure, Community & Skills for Life in Chertsey
joinCtaTitle: Want to get involved with Scouting?
address: Scout HQ, 1st, Staines Ln, Chertsey KT16 8PS.
siteDescription: Join the 1st Chertsey Scout Group - a historic hub of Scouting in Chertsey since 1909. We offer fun, adventure, and personal growth for ages 4 to 18, with sections for Squirrels, Beavers, Cubs, and Scouts. Get involved as a volunteer or sign up your child to learn skills for life in a supportive community. Located at Scout HQ, Staines Lane, Chertsey.
contactSubtitle: Thanks for viewing our website. We hope that you've found the information that you were looking for. If you want to contact us, register interest in joining or to volunteer, please use the form below and we'll be in touch.
joinCtaSubtitle: If you want to get involved with Scouting as volunteer or gain skills for life as a Squirrel, Beaver, Cub, Scout or Explorer why not 1st Chertsey Scout Group
successSubtitle: Your form submission has been received.
